summary: Build a dynamic, interactive Goal Tracker dashboard titled "My Goals : 2026" featuring seven color-coded vertical goal cards in a single horizontal row with specific typography and a "See goals per month" button.

existing_features.title: Create a dashboard page titled "My Goals : 2026" that visually matches the provided reference image, featuring a single horizontal row of exactly 7 vertical goal cards in this order and color scheme: (1) "Career-Professional" (Yellow), (2) "Personal Development" (Orange), (3) "Laboral-Job" (Red/Salmon), (4) "Family and Sentimental" (Pink), (5) "Financial" (Purple), (6) "Health" (Blue), (7) "Academic-University" (Light Green).
Apply the Lora font in italic style to all card titles and all goal text across the dashboard.
Inside each card, render a list of goals with a dashed separator line between goal items.
Implement interactive goal items so each goal can be marked complete/incomplete via a checkbox-style control, updating the UI state immediately.
Enforce the row behavior: all cards must stay on one row (no wrapping). Horizontal scrolling must be disabled when there are 7 or fewer cards, and enabled only when there are more than 7 cards.
Add a button labeled "See goals per month" at the end (right side) of the card row.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create "My Goals : 2026" dashboard layout with 7 vertical, color-coded cards in a single horizontal row (Career-Professional, Personal Development, Laboral-Job, Family and Sentimental, Financial, Health, Academic-University).
Apply Lora italic font to all card titles and goal text; add dashed separator lines between goals within each card.
Implement row behavior: keep all cards in one row; allow no horizontal scrolling unless there are more than 7 cards.
Add end-of-row button labeled "See goals per month".
Match the UI styling/layout to the provided reference picture (visual parity requirement).
